about_the_game:
"Every night, in my dreams, I visit the mountain where it all happened. I keep coming back to this place again and again. To the same mountain where I lost you forever. In my dreams, you are still here. I'm trying to reach you. To be with you once again. I'll never stop trying."

Recurring Dream is a short, atmospheric walking simulator that takes you on an emotional journey through a cold, majestic mountain lost in memory and longing. With every step you take, immerse yourself in a surreal landscape, where a deep and haunting story slowly unravels.

A Journey of Dreams and Loss

In Recurring Dream, you play as a traveller returning night after night to a familiar mountain, a place once filled with meaning and now clouded by grief and mystery. As you trek through snowy paths and mysterious environments, you will hear a heartfelt story unfold — a story of love, longing, and the struggle to find closure. Each moment bringing you closer to understanding the dreamlike world and the memories that tie you to it.

Atmospheric and Immersive

Explore a world of breathtaking sights and beautiful soundtracks designed to captivate and move you. Traverse the mountain terrain, walk across crumbling bridges, and discover paths among towering cliffs and gentle forests. The minimalist style and striking colour palette add to the otherworldly feeling - somewhere between dreams and reality.

Short and Powerful Experience

With a playtime of approximately 15-30 minutes, Recurring Dream is a compact and meaningful experience that aims to evoke strong emotions and leave a lasting impression. Perfect for those who want to experience a reflective, story-driven game in a single sitting. Explore at your own pace, soak in the ambience, and piece together the narrative as you venture to the heart of the mountain.

Key Features

  • Narrative Exploration: A first-person journey through a surreal mountain landscape, uncovering fragments of a heartfelt story.

  • Atmospheric World: Immerse yourself in hauntingly beautiful visuals, with a mix of serene landscapes and majestic vistas set against an ever-present sunset.

  • Emotional Storytelling: Engage with a moving narrative of dreams, loss, and the relentless desire to reunite with a lost loved one.

  • Short Playtime: A compact experience meant to be completed in one sitting, offering a powerful, introspective journey without demanding a significant time commitment.

  • Captivating Audio: An evocative soundtrack that enhances the sense of exploration and reflection, creating a deeper connection to the story.

Are You Ready to Dream Again?

Lose yourself in a world of memories and dreams as you trek across a lonely mountain, hoping to connect with what’s been lost. Recurring Dream is an experience that speaks to anyone who has ever longed for a moment of connection or struggled to let go.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and Windows 10/11
  • Processor: 4th gen i5 2.5 Ghz or AMD FX8350 4.0 Ghz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD 7970 or nVidia 770 or better
  • Storage: 212 MB available space

short_description: Recurring Dream is a short, atmospheric walking simulator where you revisit a cold, majestic mountain lost in memory and longing. Explore the surreal, dreamlike landscapes as you search for a loved one, unravelling a deeply emotional story.
